title: segment
description: A section inside a Mach-O binary denoting a named region of bytes inside a segment.

name.description: The name of the Mach-O segment.

memsize.description: The size of the segment in bytes, when resident in memory, according to the load command structure.

disksize.description: The size of the segment in bytes, when on disk, according to the load command structure.

sha256.description: The sha256 hash of the bytes of the segment.

offset.description: The file offset to the begining of the segment.
